issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Remove (or fix) test-ubuntu-16.04-cpp job
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12128](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12128). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-8049 increased the minimum cmake version required for bundled thrift to 3.10, which is not what 16.04 ships. We removed packaging jobs in ARROW-11910 because it is EOL in April 2021, but we still have a nightly job that is failing and other related materials (Dockerfile etc.) for 16.04.

comments.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12128?focusedCommentId=17310312) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We should remove the job.
